text: I poklonyaytes' Allakhu i ne pridavayte Yemu nichego v sotovarishchi, - a roditelyam - delaniye dobra, i blizkim, i sirotam, i bednyakam, i sosedu blizkomu po rodstvu, i sosedu chuzhomu, i drugu po sosedstvu, i putniku, i tomu, chem ovladeli desnitsy vashi. Poistine, Allakh ne lyubit tekh, kto gordelivo khvastliv
